# Building a Time Series with Zoo

```{r pec, include = FALSE}
# Load and attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(zoo)
library(lubridate)

# Read data as zoo
co2 <- readr::read_rds("data/maunaloa.Rds") %>% zoo::as.zooreg()


# Convert co2 to exercise data.frame: co2_df
co2_df <- data.frame(
  date = co2 %>% 
    time() %>%
    lubridate::date_decimal() %>% 
    lubridate::as_date(),
  concentration = zoo::coredata(co2)
)

# Remove temporary co2
```


```{r}
# Print the head of co2_df to the console
head(co2_df)

# Convert co2_df to a zoo object

co2_zoo <- zooreg(co2_df$concentration,
           order.by = co2_df$date)

# Print the structure of co2 to the console
str(co2_zoo)
```


```{r}
co2_df2 <- data.frame(
  concentration = coredata(co2_zoo),
  time = index(co2_zoo)
)

ggplot(co2_df2, aes(x = time, y = concentration)) +
  geom_line()
```
